circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Marham at 1825LT on an operation to Düsseldorf. While returning to base in the evening, it was shot down by the pilot of a JU.88 and crashed on approach to RAF Marham. A crew was killed and five others were injured. 
Crew:
Sgt John Glynne Stanley, †
Sgt R. W. Brumwell, 
Sgt G. R. Heywood,
Sgt R. Hoos, 
Sgt J. W. Groves.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
